entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a character in the story who has supreme authority over punishments and removal of privileges. She mentions that she contacted the Minister at once to agree with her on this matter.

entities.name: minerva
entities.description: Minerva is a character in the story who is being addressed by Umbridge. She is mentioned as having taken a case to Dumbledore regarding the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character in the story who is mentioned as insisting that the Gryffindor Quidditch team be allowed to play.

entities.name: gryffindor quidditch team
entities.description: The Gryffindor Quidditch team is a group of students who are trying to re-form. Umbridge mentions that she was unwilling to allow them to play.

entities.name: minister
entities.description: The Minister is a character in the story who is mentioned as agreeing with Umbridge on giving her supreme authority over punishments and removal of privileges.

relationships.description: Umbridge addresses Minerva in the conversation.
Minerva took a case to Dumbledore regarding the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
Umbridge contacted the Minister and they agreed on giving her supreme authority over punishments and removal of privileges.
